Articles.Content:
Usually have little problem with this.  Either the port is blocked, or it is full.  But neither of these are present.  I have a lander with Jeb and Bob on the Mun.  Both can exit to EVA.  But Bob will not get back in.  I tried having Jeb get out and let Bob get in first.  That didn't work.  Jeb can easily return inside, teasing Bob who is getting upset over lack of snacks outside in the dark cold of the Mun.

These are the mods installed.

BepInEx (BepInEx 1:1.7.0)
Community Fixes (CommunityFixes 0.9.0)
Community Resources (CommunityResources 0.2.0)
Docking Alignment Display (DockingAlignmentDisplay 0.4.2)
Fancy Fuel Tanks (FancyFuelTanks 0.1.4.3)
Flight Plan (FlightPlan 0.9.1)
H.U.M.A.N.S. (HUMANS v1.1.0)
K2-D2 (K2D2 v0.11.1)
Kerbal Life-Support System (KerbalLifeSupportSystem 0.5.1)
Kesa Solar (KESASolar 1.0.7)
Konfig (Konfig 0.0.4)
Kontrol System 2 (KontrolSystem2 0.5.1)
Maneuver Node Controller (ManeuverNodeController 1.1.1)
MapView Focus and Targeting (MapViewFocusTargeting 1.0.1)
Micro Engineer (MicroEngineer 1.6.0)
Node Manager (NodeManager 0.7.1)
Orbital Survey (OrbitalSurvey 0.3.0)
Patch Manager (PatchManager 0.6.1)
Shadow Utility LIB (ShadowUtilityLIB 0.0.9)
SpaceWarp (SpaceWarp 1.7.0)
UITK for KSP 2 (UITKforKSP2 2.4.0)
